mapper.update:
update dry_tower
tower_id = #{towerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=ARRAY,javaType=java.util.Set,typeHandler=com.demai.cornel.databaseHandler.ArrayStringSetTypeHandler},
location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
shipment_weight = #{shipmentWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
capacity_store = #{capacityStore,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
load_lorry_num = #{loadLorryNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
load_lorry_cost = #{loadLorryCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
bind_user_id = #{bindUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
default_flag = #{defaultFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} ,
location_area=#{locationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
location_detail=#{locationDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ,
contact_user_id=#{contactUserId,javaType=java.util.Set,typeHandler=com.demai.cornel.databaseHandler.ArrayStringSetTypeHandler}
where tower_id = #{towerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update dry_tower set company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tower_id = #{towerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, commodity_id = #{commodityId,jdbcType=ARRAY,javaType=java.util.Set,typeHandler=com.demai.cornel.databaseHandler.ArrayStringSetTypeHandler}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, shipment_weight = #{shipmentWeight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, capacity_store = #{capacityStore,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, load_lorry_num = #{loadLorryNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, load_lorry_cost = #{loadLorryCost,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, bind_user_id = #{bindUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default_flag = #{defaultFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, location_area = #{locationArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location_detail = #{locationDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact_user_id=#{contactUserId,javaType=java.util.Set,typeHandler=com.demai.cornel.databaseHandler.ArrayStringSetTypeHandler} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select location from dry_tower where bind_user_id=#{userID} limit 1;

select
from dry_tower where bind_user_id=#{userID} and status=1 order by default_flag desc,id desc ;
mapper.delete: update dry_tower set default_flag=0 where bind_user_id=#{userID} ;
mapper.select:
select
from dry_tower where status=1
and dry_tower.id < (select id from dry_tower where tower_id=#{towerId})
and dry_tower.id <= (select max(id) from dry_tower limit 1)
order by dry_tower.id desc limit #{pgSize};
select tower_id,location,location_id,company from dry_tower where status=1 order by id desc offset #{offset,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit #{pgSize,jdbcType=INTEGER} ;
